item.title: Goldman upgrades this self-driving tech stock, sees a gain of nearly 35%
item.description: Goldman analyst Tina Hou upgraded Hesai to buy from neutral, expecting the company to accelerate its global footprint and capitalize on a new product ...

item.title: Tuesday’s big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: The Nasdaq Composite fell for a fourth session on Monday as investors rotated away from tech names. Here's what's on CNBC's radar going into Tuesday.

item.title: BlackRock's Rick Rieder would ‘100%’ buy the Nasdaq dip
item.description: BlackRock's Rick Rieder said he'd "love to buy" some big cap names at cheaper multiples.

item.title: Buy these ‘bargain’ banks that offer attractive dividends and upside potential, Wells Fargo says
item.description: When it comes to this trio of midcap banks, it's time for investors to "buy the bargains," said analyst Timur Braziler.

item.title: Where to find opportunity in commercial real estate as rates climb, according to experts
item.description: The 'doom and gloom' in commercial real estate has been pushed aside, said Janus Henderson's John Kerschner.
